alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:23PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lauderdale and Colbert Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cherokee, or 8 miles southeast of Iuka, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Cherokee, Littleville, Malone, Posey Loop, Mt Hester and Srygley Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
